summary: CONSUMER HEARD A LOUD NOISE FROM THE VEHICLE, WHEN THE CONSUMER PULLED OVER, A PINK SUBSTANCE HAD LEAKED FROM THE VEHICLE.  *JB  ON EACH OCCASION , THE TRANSMISSION HAD GONE OUT, AND A LOUD NOISE WAS HEARD.  THE TRANSMISSION DIFFERENTIAL  FAILED.  THE KEEPLER PIN WAS FOUND NOT PROPERLY HARDENED.  SCC
